name: Tales of Otrana
description:
Otrana is a kingdom that is most famous for being a paradise. Tourists are drawn by its white sand beaches, for its famous delicacies and beautiful weather. It is ruled by the king Steven XIII and he is very popular amongst civilians and politicians around the world. It seems the perfect place to be and there’s nothing that can go wrong with it… One day, everything changes. Otrana is invaded by a wave of ghoul-like creatures and havoc happens: Thousands of civilians are killed, buildings are destroyed and Otrana is pretty much unrecognizable… Who could have been behind all of this?

You take control of one of the few survivors and you try to fend off the horde of ghouls in survival mode. The longer you survive, the more buffs your character gets, but as time goes by, so does your opponents. How long can you survive and keep hope alive?

We, the Tales Of Otrana developers would like to give our thanks for visiting this page, and hope you enjoy our game!

-- João Jardin & Miguel Serrano
